title: Drawing, "Design for two andirons", 1800–25
medium: Brush and yellow, green, red, black watercolor, graphite, on cream laid paper
inscribed:
Above-
top, pen and brown ink: No. 1 
bottom, pen and brown ink: 46175 dans ce genre; graphite: 80a 85f

Below-
top, pen and brown ink: No. 2
bottom, pen and brown ink: 46176 dans le genre, graphite 80a 90f
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Above: center panel with a lion mask flanked by pilasters decorated with palmette motif. On top, lowered bowl at left; footed flaming bowl at right. 
Below: center panel shows opposing fantastic swans flanking a floral motif. Palmettes at either end. On top, lowered bowl at left; footed flaming bowl at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for two andirons", 1800–25.
1800–25. Brush and yellow, green, red, black watercolor, graphite, on cream laid paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-163.
